title: ReactiveClientHeadersFactory ignores rest-client @Produces headers
body:
### Describe the bug

When i use `@RegisterClientHeaders(ReactiveHeaderFactory.class) `
`public class ReactiveHeaderFactory extends  ReactiveClientHeadersFactory`

The Annotation `@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_OCTET_STREAM) `
in rest-client is ignored and expected headers are not injected.

The detail of error:
1. Endpoint exposed with Resteasy that consumes application/json:
    `@GET
      @Consumes(MediaType.APPLICATION_JSON)
    `
2. After i execute rest-client(with reactive-headers) call where i cannot see 
expected headers injected by `@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_OCTET_STREAM) `

If i remove `@RegisterClientHeaders(ReactiveHeaderFactory.class) ` the headers are injected as exptected.

I have created the sample project where you can simulate the issue (to speed-up you can inside the project [mockoon](https://mockoon.com/) environment and [postman](https://www.postman.com/) collection)

### Expected behavior

When i use `ReactiveClientHeadersFactory` with rest-client
i expect that `@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_OCTET_STREAM)`
will include necessary headers

### Actual behavior

When i use `ReactiveClientHeadersFactory` with rest-client
i expect that `@Produces(MediaType.APPLICATION_OCTET_STREAM)`
will include necessary headers but they are not present

### How to Reproduce?

Checkout project https://github.com/herasimau/quarkus-reactiv-header-problem

Import postman collection
Import mockoon environment 
Start quarkus

Run postman end-points:

- http://localhost:9084/header/without-reactive-headers - WORKS
- http://localhost:9084/header/with-reactive-headers - DOESN'NT WORKS


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Darwin Leanids-MacBook-Pro.local 21.3.0 Darwin Kernel Version 21.3.0: Wed Jan  5 21:37:58 PST 2022; root:xnu-8019.80.24~20/RELEASE_ARM64_T6000 arm64

### Output of `java -version`

openjdk version "11.0.14" 2022-01-18 OpenJDK Runtime Environment GraalVM CE 22.0.0.2 (build 11.0.14+9-jvmci-22.0-b05)

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

Apache Maven 3.8.1 (05c21c65bdfed0f71a2f2ada8b84da59348c4c5d) Maven home: /opt/homebrew/Cellar/maven/3.8.1

### Additional information

_No response_
